text: Hi everyone! My name is Emiko (she/her/hers) and I am a first year PhD student in the Brain & Cognitive Science Experimental Psychology program. My supervisor is Dr. Penny Pexman. My first undergraduate degree was in theatre, but now I’m a stats nerd :stuck_out_tongue_closed_eyes: I’m looking forward to talking about Open Science practices with other students and being more intentional about incorporating Open Science practices into my research!
